title: Drawing, "Decorative Studies; Verso: Profile Heads of Barbarians", 1814–18
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes over graphite on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Three studies of partitions; study of ceiling with grotesque; festoon. Verso: two barbarian heads in profile from the antique.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Decorative Studies; Verso: Profile Heads of Barbarians", 1814–18.
1814–18. Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes over graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2377.
